title: Kinda Dissapointed with the Yorick skin.
body:
Not ungrateful, just it feels like shit Yorick gets a used skinline mediocre skin for the wait he's had, if he was real he'd be a abused spouse tbh, he was Released, Nerfed into the ground, left forgotten and off free rotation forever, then reworked and then nerfed early game damage (Games are mostly decided in early-mid)

Now finally, for the first time since his release, he gets his skin!
I think it looks awesome, just was hoping for atleast a legendary after this poor monk's journey.
^
taken from my comment on the situation.

I just feel like it's rushed and a used skin line the the old monk.


{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
Hi JustARivenMain - 

I'm sorry to hear you're disappointed with the new Yorick skin. Anticipation definitely grows when it comes time for a new skin, especially if its your main, and more so in Yorick's case, where it's been 6 years. 

While I can't speak a whole lot to the gameplay aspect of this guy (I'm on Skins myself), I'd be more than happy to hear ya out on what you would have wanted to see, or even any changes you'd propose to Arclight Yorick himself.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Nzzbu6IM,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-13T23:22:35.462+0000)
>
> Hi JustARivenMain - 
> 
> I'm sorry to hear you're disappointed with the new Yorick skin. Anticipation definitely grows when it comes time for a new skin, especially if its your main, and more so in Yorick's case, where it's been 6 years. 
> 
> While I can't speak a whole lot to the gameplay aspect of this guy (I'm on Skins myself), I'd be more than happy to hear ya out on what you would have wanted to see, or even any changes you'd propose to Arclight Yorick himself.

I just find it weird that a while ago riot had a thread where it was something along the lines of "What kinda skin do you want yorick to get next", and I don't remember seeing a single archlight request, so I'm just wondering if posts like that matter or if maybe there saving those idea's for furture skins.

They do matter. I think I may have commented on that thread? We keep in mind player requests for sure, and since we can't release them all at once, it may seem like we aren't hearing you. We have spaced dedicated to player concepts and ideas that we visit when we'restarting discussions around a new thematic for a champion, or when a holiday rolls around, like Snowdown.

On the contrary, there was actually a front page Reddit thread of a fan-created Arclight Yorick skin that popped up while we were in the middle of developing Arclight Yorick internally. There seemed to be a fairly big interest in the thematic there. Now, I'm not saying 'Reddit liked it, so we did the right thing', I'm saying that it was a suggested thematic elsewhere.
Na if "Reddit liked it" you did the right thing :3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Nzzbu6IM,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-13T23:22:35.462+0000)
>
> Hi JustARivenMain - 
> 
> I'm sorry to hear you're disappointed with the new Yorick skin. Anticipation definitely grows when it comes time for a new skin, especially if its your main, and more so in Yorick's case, where it's been 6 years. 
> 
> While I can't speak a whole lot to the gameplay aspect of this guy (I'm on Skins myself), I'd be more than happy to hear ya out on what you would have wanted to see, or even any changes you'd propose to Arclight Yorick himself.

I was hoping for a legendary quality summoner skin, such as the Dragon Summoner suggestions or something, Arclight just seems like it's rushed and I get the whole, opposite theme of  the champion itself (He's pretty dark themed as he's ofc from Blessed Isles). I honestly think a summoner theme would have been awesome, maybe even a full on corruption version of himself aswell, as for Arclight changes all I can say is I hope you guys do the best you can, and maybe had a "Holy" type of background noise to his voice so it isn't so gritty and not fit the theme of the skin.

It's totally on me for hoping for two Legendary skins for both my mains in the same year but what can you do eh?

Totally appriciate the reply Katey, I know you guys try your best.. I know you guys didn't mean to make it feel rushed, or do it just to kill the meme. <3


P.S: A sorta frost themed skeletal Dragon lich king-themed skin would be 10/10 for the future.

Edit: ALSO, I don't post a lot, but this means a ton to me, I'd honestly even wait for a higher tier skin as a Legendary or Ultimate, as it's a major feelsbad for Yi to get two same tier skins in 5 months as Yorick in 6 years. (Ik he got a rework and all, but that was NEEDED for him to be noticed by Riot on the balancing team again.)

We know why he had to wait so long, but it's just unfortunate that there's characters in the game that get 1-2 skins a year, and some (Like Yorick) that people have to wait for a bone to be thrown to.  Arclight, in my opinion, is one of the blandest skin lines ever created.  The only character I've even remotely enjoyed seeing it used on was Vel'koz, with Vayne being a followup.

What really salts the wound too is that there were so many fan concepts and ideas that received hundreds, even thousands of upvotes over the years.  Arcade Yorick with a Pac Man theme, Crazy Cat Lady Yorick, and a couple others that have popped up.  To see that he gets Arclight is really disheartening, and this is as someone who plays him on and off.

Overall, the skin screams rushed, and like it was created to end 'meme' material.  The fact that it's also not seeing a voice filter is just laughable.

>with Syndra being a followup.

Do you mean Vayne? Because Syndra doesn't have an Arclight skin.
Yes, I did mean Vayne.  It's funny too because I told myself NOT to say Syndra, as her theme is Justicar lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Angus The Bear,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Nzzbu6IM,comment-id=0001000200000000,timestamp=2017-09-14T02:06:46.110+0000)
>
> Yes, I did mean Vayne.  It's funny too because I told myself NOT to say Syndra, as her theme is Justicar lol.

It's pretty much the same tbh.

Arclight is a boring, generic skin line and Arclight Yorick feels like Riot just wanted to check off the box of "Give Yorick a skin so people stop complaining".

It is particularly disappointing given how many creative options Riot had for Yorick, since he has so few skins. Beekeeper Singed is a creative skin, which in comparison makes the Yorick skin feel even worse since Singed has many skins and still is getting good, creative skins but Yorick can't. Crazy Cat-lady Yorick would be a creative, interesting skin. A Poro-based Yorick skin would be very interesting and fun. Arclight might as well be a palate-swap - the only interesting thing going on is the change to the W and to a lesser extent the sound effects.
Yeah, but it's a Yorick skin and I am to buy it. The only sad thing is that in the next 3 years he won't get a new skin but Yi will get like 100000 for that time.
